main: S2 consumes 10 Count to get +2 Coin Power, and if he still has 8 more Count after that, consumes the 8 to deal 40% more bonus damage. If he has 5-9 Count, he gains 10 {status:Sinking} to raise his Count to 10, so he can spend it. He also adds Indiscriminate, {status:WideAreaRampage}, and +1 atk weight to the skill. This means he chooses one other random target outside of his main target (both allies and enemies), then every coin he uses will hit either one of the two at random. At 5+ {status:Charge} Potency, it stops gaining Indiscriminate, which removes the chance of him selecting allies as the secondary target, but he'll still choose a second target and randomly hit between the two.
other: Gains {status:Charge} Potency for every 10 cumulative Count spent. Potency increases his Count generation on his skills.
{status:Charge} Potency gives his skills additional Power and damage, and if his passive is active, he inflicts more {status:Sinking} and even more damage with his skills at 2+ Potency.

1061201.desc:
Gain 1 [Charge] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [Charge] Count in this Encounter

At 2+ [Charge]:
- Inflict +1 more [Sinking] with Base Attack Skills (does not activate when inflicting only [Sinking] Count or when inflicting [Sinking] on self)
- Deal +([Charge] x 3)% damage with Base Attack Skills (max 15%)
1061201.name: Brainwave Charge-focusing Antlers

1061211.desc:
Gain 1 [Charge] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [Charge] Count in this Encounter

At 2+ [Charge]:
- Inflict +1 more [Sinking] with Base Attack Skills for every 2 [Charge] (max 2, does not activate when inflicting only [Sinking] Count or when inflicting [Sinking] on self)
- Deal +([Charge] x 5)% damage with Base Attack Skills (max 25%)
1061211.name: Brainwave Charge-focusing Antlers

1061221.desc: 1 ally with the most [Charge]: when using a Base Attack Skill that gains [Charge] Count, deal +10% damage with the final Coin
1061221.name: Charged Pulverization Support

1061231.desc: 1 ally with the most [Charge]: when using a Base Attack Skill that gains [Charge] Count, deal +15% damage with the final Coin
1061231.name: Charged Pulverization Support
